author: Adrian Collins
description:
Matthew Wards wraps up The Soulfire Saga with an expansive and explosive ending in The Lie That Binds Them. Ward pulls back the veil on his world for some epic twists and reveals, while our favourite characters hold on to hope by their shredded fingernails. Tyzantia, the last of the free cities is about to […]

The post The Lie That Binds Them by Matthew Ward appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: The Lie That Binds Them by Matthew Ward
